sqlMap.select: select t.fid, t.orderno, f.filmname, t.price, t.countprice, t.ticketsnum, t.result_pay, t.seatinfo, h.hallname, t.showdate, t.showtime from t0300_orderform t left join t0201_feature_app f on t.featureappno = f.featureappno left join t0103_hallinfo h on t.hallno = h.hallno where t.orderno = '$order_no$' ORDER BY t.showdate

select ol.orderlist_id, ol.order_no, ol.goods_id, tg.goods_name, ol.goods_count, ol.goods_price, ol.goods_countprice from t0300_orderlist ol left join t0200_goods tg on ol.goods_id = tg.goods_id where ol.order_no = #order_no#

select a.activity_id, a.title, a.activestate, a.cont, a.actimg, a.imgtype, a.activity_name, a.starttime, a.endtime, a.addtime, a.actimg_h, a.featureno, a.seatcount from t0300_userorder t left join t0403_activity a on t.activity_id = a.activity_id where t.order_no = #order_no#

select f.FILMNAME, (select p.placename from t0100_placeinfo p where p.placeno =t.placeid ) as placename, t.showdate,t.showtime,t.printedflg, t.price,t.countprice, (select h.hallname from t0103_placehallinfo h where h.hallno = t.hallno and h.placeno = t.placeid) as hallname, t.ticketsnum, t.seatinfo, t.orderdate from t0300_orderform t,t0111_filmmessage f where f.filmno = t.filmno
t.fid = #fid#
